item_1.title: Chaotic Schedules
item_1.desc: Often forget meetings or important appointments? ASPRI reminds you automatically at the right time.

item_2.title: Untracked Expenses
item_2.desc: Money's gone but don't know where? Log transactions via chat, get smart summaries.

item_3.title: Scattered Notes
item_3.desc: Hard to find important notes? Store everything in one place with smart search.

chat.title: Smart Multi-Platform Chat
chat.description: Interact with your personal assistant via web or Telegram. Talk naturally like normal chat, ASPRI understands context and your language.

notes.title: Securely Stored Notes
notes.description: Create, edit, and search notes easily. All stored in encrypted database. Block-based editor for more flexible content formatting.

schedule.title: Smart Calendar & Reminders
schedule.description: Manage schedules, events, and reminders. ASPRI will remind you through the app or Telegram. No Google Calendar needed!

finance.title: Complete Financial Tracking
finance.description: Record income, expenses, and set budgets. Interactive dashboard displays charts and monthly financial summaries.
